front.title: IEEE Standard Criteria for Class 1E Power Systems for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard applies to the Class 1E portions of the following systems and equipment in single unit and multiunit nuclear power generating stations: (1) Alternating current power systems (2) Direct current power systems (3) Vital instrumentation and control power systems (4) Protective action systems.
